languages.text: Провидец Муаран, по воле Лорд-капитана бытующий на агромире Янус, поведал о ловушке, в которую угодили эльдары с Крудараха. Этот мир наполнен зеленью, но название его сокрыто в тумане видений — Ирлиэт и Лорд-капитану придется отыскать его самостоятельно.

The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.
languages.original_text: Провидец Муаран, по воле Лорд-капитана бытующий на агромире Янус, поведал о ловушке, в которую угодили эльдары с Крудараха. Этот мир наполнен зеленью, но название его сокрыто в тумане видений — Ирлиэт и Лорд-капитану придется отыскать его самостоятельно.

According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

languages.text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran, qui réside sur l'agri-monde de Janus avec la permission {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, a fait état d'un piège dans lequel seraient tombés les survivants de Crudarach. Apparemment, l'incident est survenu sur un monde verdoyant dont le nom ne lui a pas été révélé dans ses visions. Yrliet et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devront le trouver par leurs propres moyens.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

traits.locale_text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran, qui réside sur l'agri-monde de Janus avec la permission {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, a fait état d'un piège dans lequel seraient tombés les survivants de Crudarach. Apparemment, l'incident est survenu sur un monde verdoyant dont le nom ne lui a pas été révélé dans ses visions. Yrliet et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devront le trouver par leurs propres moyens.

languages.text: 在行商浪人的许可下，艾达灵族的先知穆兰在农业世界加努斯安顿下来。他的预言显示，克鲁达拉赫的一部分幸存者落入了陷阱之中。根据穆兰的说法，那些幸存者落入了某个翠绿色的世界之中，这个世界的名字隐藏在幻象的迷雾之中，伊莉耶特和行商浪人必须凭借自己的力量，找到这个世界的所在之处。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人的许可下，艾达灵族的先知穆兰在农业世界加努斯安顿下来。他的预言显示，克鲁达拉赫的一部分幸存者落入了陷阱之中。根据穆兰的说法，那些幸存者落入了某个翠绿色的世界之中，这个世界的名字隐藏在幻象的迷雾之中，伊莉耶特和行商浪人必须凭借自己的力量，找到这个世界的所在之处。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの許しを得てヤヌスの農業惑星に居住している先見司ムアランが、クルダラ出身のアエルダリの生き残りを捕える罠について話してくれた。ムアランによれば、これは緑豊かな惑星で起こったことで、その名前はビジョンの霧の中に隠されている…ユリエットとロード・キャプテンはそれを己で見つけなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの許しを得てヤヌスの農業惑星に居住している先見司ムアランが、クルダラ出身のアエルダリの生き残りを捕える罠について話してくれた。ムアランによれば、これは緑豊かな惑星で起こったことで、その名前はビジョンの霧の中に隠されている…ユリエットとロード・キャプテンはそれを己で見つけなければならない。

languages.text: Der Runenprophet Muaran, der mit Erlaubnis des Lord Captains auf der Agrarwelt Janus lebt, hatte etwas zu berichten. Die Aeldari-Überlebenden von Crudarach wurden in eine Falle gelockt. Laut Muaran ist dies auf einer fruchtbaren Welt geschehen, deren Name im Nebel der Visionen verborgen liegt. Yrliet und der Lord Captain müssen sie allein finden.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

traits.locale_text: Der Runenprophet Muaran, der mit Erlaubnis des Lord Captains auf der Agrarwelt Janus lebt, hatte etwas zu berichten. Die Aeldari-Überlebenden von Crudarach wurden in eine Falle gelockt. Laut Muaran ist dies auf einer fruchtbaren Welt geschehen, deren Name im Nebel der Visionen verborgen liegt. Yrliet und der Lord Captain müssen sie allein finden.

languages.text: El vidente Muaran, que vive en el mundo agrícola de Janus con permiso de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, informa de una trampa que ha atrapado a los supervivientes Aeldari de Crudarach. Según Muaran, el suceso se ha producido en un mundo cuyo nombre no aparece en la niebla de las visiones, por lo que Yrliet y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tendrán que encontrarlo por cuenta propia.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.

traits.locale_text: El vidente Muaran, que vive en el mundo agrícola de Janus con permiso de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, informa de una trampa que ha atrapado a los supervivientes Aeldari de Crudarach. Según Muaran, el suceso se ha producido en un mundo cuyo nombre no aparece en la niebla de las visiones, por lo que Yrliet y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tendrán que encontrarlo por cuenta propia.

languages.text: Janus zirai dünyasında Lord Kaptan'ın izniyle yaşayan Ötesezen Muaran, Crudarach'tan gelen Aeldari felaketzedelerin tuzağa düştüğünden bahsetti. Muaran'ın dediğine göre bu olay, ismi görülerin gölgesinde gizlenen bir dünyada yaşandı. Yrliet ve Lord Kaptan, bu dünyayı tek başlarına bulmak zorunda kalacak.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran, who resides on the agri-world of Janus by the Lord Captain's leave, has told of a trap that has taken hold of the Aeldari survivors from Crudarach. According to Muaran, this transpired on a verdant world whose name is hidden in the mist of visions — Yrliet and the Lord Captain will have to find it on their own.
